alert.note: Alert for Grant Grove Area; Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge; Kings Canyon NP; Sequoia NP; South End of the Upper Sierra (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 08 at 1:24AM PST until November 09 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 feet above 6,000 feet. Snowfall of 2 to 4 feet from 5,000 feet to 6,000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 feet from 4,000 feet to 5,000 feet. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge, Kings Canyon NP, Grant Grove Area, Sequoia NP and South End of the Upper Sierra. * WHEN...Through 10 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Count on road closures due to snow cover. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches along with blowing snow that could significantly reduce visibilities.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Grant Grove Area; Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge; Kings Canyon NP; Sequoia NP; South End of the Upper Sierra
